name: Pokémon Desert Version
overview: Description: A Gastly comes to you in a nightmare, and then a Trapinch needs rescuing outside. Bam - starter Pokemon. All the kids in your neighborhood also have new Pokemon, so you battle all of them until eventually you decide to go into the main city. There, you meet Brendan, an immigrant from Hoenn. He tells you about the gym challenge and off you go! Multiple Stories: 1. Gym challenge w/ rivals (May, Brendan, Blue/TheNameYouChoose 2. Team Rocket's Shenanigans 3. Cartels 4. California Secessionists Features: • New story • New tiles • Map based off of South West USA Bugs: • When you get out of a wild encounter by the cut cactus, it turns you into a glitched cut cacti that's all sorts of psyducked. I left a single wild patch by the cactus if you wanna find out what the error is. • Empty moves look weird! • Nicknaming Trapinch nicknames Gastly • When you enter Mesa for the first time, sometimes the script with the rivals doesn't pop. I'm not sure why this is. If you keep running around the area it eventually pops. • Whenever Clear Smog is used, the game crashes. • Bulldoze doesn't actually hit two targets as it says it does.
